articles.title: Elon Musk's X Sheds Over 1,000 Staff Tasked With Stopping Abusive Content - NDTV
articles.description: Elon Musk's X has shed more than 1,000 staff globally from teams responsible for stopping abusive content online, according to new figures released Thursday by Australia's online watchdog.
articles.content:
Australia's eSafety Commission has in recent months zeroed in on X, formerly Twitter (File)
Elon Musk's X has shed more than 1,000 staff globally from teams responsible for stopping abusive content … [+2118 chars]
